paper_abstract: Boolean functions with high nonlinearity, high resiliency and strict avalanche criterion (SAC) play an important role in the designs of conventional cryptographic systems. In this paper, a method is proposed to construct resilient Boolean functions on n variables (n even) satisfying SAC with nonlinearity >2(n-1) - 2(n/2). A large class of cryptographic Boolean functions that were not known earlier were obtained.
paper_title: Construction of highly nonlinear resilient Boolean functions satisfying strict avalanche criterion
